text: Aubonne is a municipality in Morges in the canton of Vaud in Switzerland. The former municipality of Pizy merged on 1 July 2011, into the municipality of Aubonne.Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz published by the Swiss Federal Statistical Office accessed 17 February 2011 On 1 January 2021, Montherod became a part of Aubonne. On 5 December 2017, Michael I of Romania died in his home in Aubonne. == References == == Other websites == * Official website * Category:Cities in Switzerland
title: Aubonne
